sentence: If Madison Were Omar To the Editor: Re Police Accuse Lawmaker of Trying to Fly With Gun? (news article, April 27), about Representative Madison Cawthorn trying to bring a gun through airport security: Instead of this ultraright white man, imagine this story being about another professional American man, this one with swarthy skin and named Omar, who was twice caught trying to bring a loaded gun onto a commercial flight.
title: Tucker Carlson's Influence on America and Its Media
